# Copilot Instructions for EasyGRC

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This is a comprehensive GRC (Governance, Risk, and Compliance) web application built with React, TypeScript, and Vite. The application is designed to be mobile-first and responsive.

## Project Structure
- **Dashboard**: Main overview of compliance status and risk metrics
- **Risk Management**: Risk assessment, mitigation, and monitoring
- **Compliance Tracking**: Regulatory requirements and status tracking
- **Audit Management**: Audit planning, execution, and findings
- **Policy Management**: Document management and policy compliance
- **Reporting**: Analytics and compliance reporting

## Coding Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components and utilities
- Follow React functional components with hooks
- Implement responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Use modern CSS techniques (Flexbox, Grid, CSS Custom Properties)
- Ensure accessibility (ARIA labels, semantic HTML)
- Follow Material Design or similar UI patterns for consistency
- Implement proper error handling and loading states
- Use proper TypeScript types for GRC-specific data structures

## Key Features to Implement
- Interactive dashboards with charts and metrics
- Risk assessment forms and workflows
- Compliance checklists and status tracking
- Audit trail and documentation
- Policy document management
- Automated reporting and notifications
- Mobile-responsive navigation and layouts
